description: This is the script for the story portion of the game and will also serve as the instruction manual on how to display each scene

lines.speaker: Default
lines.line: TEXT

lines.speaker: Default
lines.line: TEXT 2

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Years ago, an alien vessel appeared in our Solar system.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It was massive- easily the size of a city.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Scientists suggested making contact with the vessel in the hopes of brokering peace.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The ship arrived on Earth and hovered in the sky. It appeared to be waiting for our first move.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: However...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It didn't wait long before it released hundreds of thousands of its brood.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They swarmed visiously around the mothership.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Frightened, Earth decided to attack. They wanted to eliminte the threat before any damage was caused.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The swarms fought back.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Their onslaught was unrelenting. Should we have waited any longer, they would have overpowered us.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Armies from around the globe unleashed their might and wrath on the invaders to no avail.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The sheer size of the swarm was overwhelming.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We had to resort to a last-ditch effort to annihilate the aliens.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: A brave team of fighter jet pilots stepped up to the plate with a plan. It was bold and daring but it was our only hope.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They worked together to fly a nuclear warhead through the swarm...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: ...and into the heart of the mothership.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The pilots gave their lives to defend all of humanity.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This selfless act woke the world up to the reality of our situation.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We were not alone.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Not only that but we were also heavily outnumbered and out-gunned.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We had to make a change to how we work as a species if we ever wanted to stand a chance if they came back.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This lead to the founding of International Battle School, a place for young, bright minds to train to fight the Formic aliens.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: In Battle School, we studied the enemy,

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We trained hand-to-hand combat,

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We gunned down hundreds of formic vessels in complex simulations.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We went through thick and thin together, as brothers and sisters.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: For the past 5 years, we have been training.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Every morning, I woke up knowing that the world was counting on our success.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It was difficult,

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It was demanding,

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It forged me into a warrior.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: It forged all of us into warriors.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Today was the big day.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This was the day of our final examination.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The culmination of all the blood, sweat and tears.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The day we would quench our battleforged bodies and minds.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This anticipation simmered deep within as I slept my final days away as a recruit.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The next time I open my eyes and look in the mirror, I wouldn't see the cowardly boy I once was.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I will see the hero I always wanted to be.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Final exam day.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I sat up in my bunk and saw the familiar faces of my cohort. They too, were beginning to wake up.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Any moment now, Sergeant Dap would march into our quarters and deliver the itinerary.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Mornin' Ender.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Hey Petra. Ready for today?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Yup. How about you?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Ready to get of here, that's for sure, Haha

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Yeah, I think we're all aching to see some action. I know I am.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Petra's our team captain.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: She's aced every solo simulation in the database and she knows just about everything there is to know about our enemy.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: In my mind, she's the best person for the job.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Let's show the commander what we can do, Ender. Let's show humanity that they can count on us.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Yeah, this is our big moment. No way in hell I'm giving anything but my all.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Just as I finished that thought, we both heard it. We all heard it.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: None other than Sergeant Dap marched into our sleeping quarters and stood vigilantly by the door.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: SERGEANT ON DECK!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: A robotic storage unit rolled into the room and parked itself next to him. Its door opened, revealing a dozen orange jumpsuits.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We all scrambled and stood ourselves up in front of our respective bunks.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: AT EASE, RECRUITS.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Everyone relaxed their posture and held their hands behind their back. Sgt. Dap continued...

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: AS MOST OF YOU MIGHT KNOW, IT'S EXAM DAY TODAY.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: WE WILL BE EVALUATING YOUR PERFORMANCE IN A SIMULATION THAT WILL TEST EVERYTHING YOU'VE LEARNED.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: THE WORLD IS COUNTING ON YOU LOT.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: GET YOUR JUMPSUIT FROM THIS UNIT, GET YOUR BREAKFAST AND MEET ME IN THE SIMULATION LAB IN ONE HOUR.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: DO NOT BE LATE.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: UNDERSTOOD, RECRUITS?

lines.speaker: Everyone
lines.line: SIR, YES SIR!

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: As you were.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: He left the quarters at a brisk pace and everyone lined up to get their jumpuits.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Wow, mine fits perfectly.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Mine too!

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: These are great, it feels like we're a real squadron!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Well, thats the plan isn't it?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Yeah. I hope our exam is extra hard.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: What? Why?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Well Ender, I, for one, like a challenge.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Of course you do. Do you want me to do the exam blindfolded?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Haha, I'm only kidding.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: You can do what you want though, don't let me rain on your parade.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: We're all counting on your tactics today. I hope you whet your senses in those weird dreams of yours.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Oh come on, those Formic couldn't split their formations if their lives depended on it.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Oh.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Wait, it does, Haha

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: That's just because you don't call their shots. Imagine if they had a Formic Ender.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I'm gonna pretend you didn't just say 'Formic Ender', Haha

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: This will be just like every other simulation.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: We'll take it slow and steady, watch their movements and react.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Our victory is assured so long as we all work together.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: I like where your head's at.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: C'mon, let's get some food.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Yeah, I'm hungry. Let's go.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We all got breakfast together, we shared our excitement and we made our way to the simulation lab.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: When we arrived, Sgt. Dap and the Battle School Commander, Captain Graff were waiting for us.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We marched into the lab and stood at attention.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This was it.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: When we first arrived here, all I could think about was this moment.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: ...And it's finally here.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I took a deep breath and Captain Graff welcomed us.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Recruits. I hope you're well prepared.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: I've been watching you all diligently these past years. You've all made remarkable progress.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: This simulation will be just like the ones you've done before but we will not be calling the shots.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: It will be up to you to decide how to best deal with the Formic enemies in this test.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Sergeant, you can explain the ruling. Once we're all on board, we will begin.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: ALRIGHT EVERYONE, LISTEN CLOSELY.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: I'M ONLY GOING TO EXPLAIN THIS ONCE.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: AS PER USUAL, ENDER WILL BE YOUR TACTICIAN.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: EVERYONE ELSE WILL BE AT THEIR USUAL BATTLESTATIONS.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: IN ADDITION TO YOUR OWN DREADNOUGHTS, YOU WILL ALSO BE ASSISTED BY THE CHIMERA FLEET.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: IN THIS SIMULATION, YOUR GOAL IS TO ELIMINATE THE ENEMIES BY ANY MEANS.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: ENDER.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: USE THE MOUSE TO MOVE YOUR BATTLECRUISER AND HOLD THE RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON TO FIRE YOUR YAMATO CANNONS.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: IMPRESS US AND YOU WILL ALL GRADUATE TO COMMAND SCHOOL. ARE WE CLEAR?

lines.speaker: Everyone
lines.line: SIR, YES SIR!

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: GOOD. PETRA, YOU MAY PROCEED.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Alright Dragons, it's showtime!

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Felix, Claire, You're on West scouting.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Panera, Talton, You're on East.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ender's hanging back with backup from Aaron and Chloe.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: The rest of us will play Ender's moves.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Good?

lines.speaker: Everyone
lines.line: YES, MA'AM!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I took a seat in a large chair and put my visor on.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I saw my name flash and then the simulation began.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Alright, let's get a sitrep on the situation.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: What are those? Hive clusters?

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: And this planet...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: My scanners indicate that this is could be their homeworld.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: There's lots of activity but they don't seem to be bothered by our presence.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We might need to get closer to see how they attack us.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Left wing, deploy scouting drones.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Right wing, ready the photon cannons and await my orders.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Central, chart a course to orbit the planet at 44 degrees off the prime meridian.

lines.speaker: Team Comms
lines.line: ROGER. Moving into position.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: We waited for a few minutes but the Formic remained calm and unresponsive to our advances.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They're not approaching us.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: What's happening?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ender? What are your orders?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I want to lure them away from their home before attacking. We can't take that many head-on without losses.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Scouts, can you see what they're doing?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Keep a distance of 5 kilometres at all costs. If they follow, fly them to us.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Chimera fleet, take on a gamma-formation and get ready to catch them if they flank us.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: We need to make sure they don't catch us off guard.

lines.speaker: Chimera Advisor
lines.line: Roger.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They're not attacking us like they usually do...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Is this a trap?

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: There's no readings on our flanks.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This seems too easy.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Chimera! You're way too close!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Huh? What's going on?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Chimera is approaching the homeworld at high speed!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: What?!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Sure enough, the fleet assumed the formation...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: ...but they're encroaching on their territory.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Chimera, come in Chimera.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Chimera!?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Come in, Chimera?!!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Not good.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Chimera is 30 kilometers out. Ender, Orders?

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: What is going on?!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: CHIMERA, TURN BACK NOW. DO YOU COPY?

lines.speaker: Chimera Advisor
lines.line: SHSHHSHSHSHHSSHSHSHSHHSHSHSHS ENGINE NOT RESPHGHGHFIDFFIIJISHSHSHHSGHDGJIJBI

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Chimera! Repeat!

lines.speaker: Chimera Advisor
lines.line: SHSHHSHSHH INTERFERENSHSHHSESHSHHS NO GOODSHSHSHSH SHSHSHHSHSHSHSHSHHSHSH

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: What is going on?!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Chimera, if you can hear me, fall back NOW. We can't follow you in, it's suicide!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Did the Formic use some sort of trap on us?

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: How is this happening right now, during the most important fight of our lives?

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ender. They're swarming Chimera!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The radar was lit up with a massive swarm of Formic aliens.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Time is running out. We have to do something. Fast.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Okay.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: EVERYONE, BATTLE POSITIONS.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Maintain a concave on them.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Dreadnoughts, provide cover fire for the Chimera fleet.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Battlecruisers, now's the time!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Let's get them out of there!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: DRAGONS, ATTACK!

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Well done everyone!

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Those were some fancy moves, Ender!

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: Congratulations, cadets!

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: The world will forver know your name, Ender.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: The war is as good as over.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Thank you, Captain.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: No, it's you who I should be thanking, Ender. Your heoric acts have saved us.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: This wasn't a simulation.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Wait.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: What?

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: I placed my faith in you, Ender. You followed through and now the Formic species has been decimated.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: You will go down in history as the greatest tactician ever known. You've saved the Earth.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I'm confused.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: The war is over. We won.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: That wasn't a simulation? I really just ordered the genocide of nearly an entire alien species?

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Genocide is not the right word. You're a hero, Ender. What you did will be remembered for the rest of time.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: No.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Ender..

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: No...

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: This is wrong.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: This wasn't heroic at all, Captain.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: They never aggressed on us. We assaulted their homeworld and wiped them out without having a second thought for peace.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: They were waiting. I saw it.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: This was all planned?

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Ender...

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: People are going to call me a hero for this?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: For being tricked into genociding an entire race?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: There's nothing heroic about that. I'm no better than an bloodthirsty warlord.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: There were millions of them.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: There were likely more than 50 million.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Ender.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: 50 MILLION FORMIC LIVES.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: ALL GONE.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: OBLITERATED AND FORGOTTEN.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ender, you didn't know-

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: It's easy for you to say that when you're just following orders.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Ender. This is enough.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Have you lost your mind?

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Ender.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: How are you going to sleep at night with this on your conscience?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: PLEASE, tell me. I want to know.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: ENOUGH.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: Everyone else, return to your quarters.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: I'm sorry Ender, what's done is done. There's no going back.

lines.speaker: Captain Graff
lines.line: If you understood what was on the line, you would have done the same.
